author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains the second part of NANOAOD developments for UL and full Run2 analyses.
No changes are expected outside of NANOAOD content.

Main items:
- updated muon preselection and ID content
- 2018 EGM scales and smearings
- Higgs STXS stage 1.1
- minor additions to generator and trigger content

Depends on #26724 and cms-sw/cmsdist#4995
title: NanoAOD developments: 190520 version, part 2 for UL
